sub_title: Shell - Sr. VP Opportunity Value Assurance  - Non Executive Director - d.light
summary: Member of the Senior Executive Group of Royal Dutch Shell since 2010. As from January 2021, Senior VP Opportunity Value Assurance, leading a team of ca. 25 professionals located in The Hague, London, and Houston.  My team provides independent assurance as well as investment appraisal advice on all capital expenditures and NBD proposals which go to the Executive Committee and Board.  Over 30 years of Shell experience in commercial and finance leadership positions of increasing responsibility in the Netherlands, Africa (Nigeria and Congo) and the Far East (Vietnam). Non-Executive Director at d.light, a global leader and pioneer in delivering affordable solar-powered solutions designed for the two billion people in the developing world without access to reliable energy. Prior to Shell, I worked as economist for the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) in the Comoros Islands and Togo. I am fluent in Dutch (native), English and French. Married with two children.
